wikipedia_page.main: James Heywood Markland (1788–1864) was an English solicitor and antiquary.

response: Freeling was married three times and had many children. On his death on 10 July 1836, he was succeeded in the baronetcy by his eldest surviving son, Sir George Henry Freeling (22 September 1789 – 30 November 1841). The eldest daughter, Charlotte, married James Heywood Markland.
